title: Beacon Error: gRPC panicked - runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description Upgraded to alpha.27 and get error dump as below ### Has this worked before in a previous version? Yes, the previous version in which this bug was not present was: alpha.26 ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction Upgraded from alpha.26 to alpha.27 same config. ## üî• Error 



time="2020-09-29 23:58:21" level=error msg="gRPC panicked!" error="runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference" stack="goroutine 3041872 [running]:

## üåç Your Environment **Operating System:** Ubuntu latest on Pi4 8GB
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)** alpha.27
**Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?** https://medalla.beaconcha.in/dashboard?validators=12425,12433,12437,12442,12446,12456,12457,12461,12465,12469,12473,12474,12477,12480,12487,12490,12493,12499,12504,12509,12511,12516,12521,12525,12527,12532,12542,12544,12552,12567,12568,12569,12574
Hello @xuyenvuong , thank you for reporting. What caused this error? Was the beacon node just running and it randomly stopped or did you attempt to cancel it?

@0xKiwi - The beacon node was running at the the time. I didn't stop it and let it ran until the next alpha release. It didn't stop, but my Grafana webhook was constantly reporting this type of error. Thanks.
